message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I understand that $85 is a good offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway again! I can do $84. Would that work for you?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
